channel.title: Re: Making A Server Without A Router?
channel.description: Guys, I only have a modem whatever. I dont have a router, but I want to make a server and let everyone join. But is it possible? If so please help me. :( :(

item.title: Re: Making A Server Without A Router?

item.description:

[quote=“rs2pur3, post:1, topic:83943”]Guys, I only have a modem whatever.
I dont have a router, but I want to make a server
and let everyone join. But is it possible?
If so please help me. :([/quote]

Hehe I have to say, servers dont work with my router, so i use my modem and everything works on my server ( my maximum players ever was 89 (No Lag) )

Read full topic

item.source: Re: Making A Server Without A Router?

item.title: Re: Making A Server Without A Router?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If you don’t have a router, then you don’t need to port forward. All you have to do is set your firewall up so that it doesn’t block requests from various people on the port that your server uses.

To do this, go into your firewall, and add that port to the exceptions list. That should allow connections from everyone, which means they can then connect to your server.

Read full topic
item.source: Re: Making A Server Without A Router?
